timeline.body: instead  of checking if it exists and returning true, can you check if it does NOT exist and then return false
timeline.bodyText: instead  of checking if it exists and returning true, can you check if it does NOT exist and then return false
timeline.bodyHTML: instead of checking if it exists and returning true, can you check if it does NOT exist and then return false
timeline.author: Pikachu920

timeline.message: Merge branch 'swing-hand' of https://github.com/OfficialDonut/Skript into swing-hand

timeline.body: I think the patterns should be on their own lines. Also `off hand` should probably be `off[ ]hand`
timeline.bodyText: I think the patterns should be on their own lines. Also off hand should probably be off[ ]hand
timeline.bodyHTML: I think the patterns should be on their own lines. Also off hand should probably be off[ ]hand
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.body:
This should probably support "hand" vs "off hand"
e.g.
```suggestion
		return "make " + entities.toString(e, debug) + " swing their " +(isMainHand ? "hand" : "off hand");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This should probably support "hand" vs "off hand"
e.g.

Suggested change
return "make " + entities.toString(e, debug) + " swing hand";
return "make " + entities.toString(e, debug) + " swing their " +(isMainHand ? "hand" : "off hand");
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyHTML:
You should be checking this in registration. No need to register this effect if it can't be used.

if (Skript.methodExists(LivingEntity.class, "swingMainHand"))
	Skript.registerEffect(...);

EDIT: We agreed that this is okay
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.body:
Oops - I'm a liar
We wanted to standardize this to the following:
```suggestion
@RequiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.15.2+")
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Oops - I'm a liar
We wanted to standardize this to the following:

Suggested change
@RequiredPlugins("1.15.2 or newer")
@RequiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.15.2+")
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.body:
There could be better wording even than what I'm suggesting
```suggestion
			Skript.error("The swing hand effect requires Minecraft 1.15.2 or newer");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
There could be better wording even than what I'm suggesting

Suggested change
Skript.error("The swing hand effect requires server version 1.15.2 or newer");
Skript.error("The swing hand effect requires Minecraft 1.15.2 or newer");
timeline.author: APickledWalrus
